languages.text: {n}Неприятное лицо Махария Зауэрбэка кривится в злой ухмылке.{/n} "Я первее всех готов винить Вольных Торговцев Простора Коронус в распущенности перед лицом законов, только я свое мнение не выдаю за правосудие. Род Зауэрбэк верен Вольному Торговцу!"
languages.translation_comment: Макарий Зауэрбэк — если жив и жена не казнена и если Макарий жив
Макарий Зауэрбэк — если жив и жена не казнена и если Макарий жив

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: {n}Неприятное лицо Махария Зауэрбэка кривится в злой ухмылке.{/n} "Я первее всех готов винить Вольных Торговцев Простора Коронус в распущенности перед лицом законов, только я свое мнение не выдаю за правосудие. Род Зауэрбэк верен Вольному Торговцу!"

House Sauerback is loyal to the Lord Captain!"

{n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

{n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback verzieht sein hässliches Gesicht zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Ich wäre der Erste, der die eklatante Verletzung der Gesetze durch die Freihändler der Koronus-Ausdehnung anprangern würde, aber ich maße mir nicht an, meine Meinung als Recht zu verkaufen. Haus Sauerback ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben!"
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback verzieht sein hässliches Gesicht zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "Ich wäre der Erste, der die eklatante Verletzung der Gesetze durch die Freihändler der Koronus-Ausdehnung anprangern würde, aber ich maße mir nicht an, meine Meinung als Recht zu verkaufen. Haus Sauerback ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben!"

languages.text: {n}Un sourire narquois déforme le visage ingrat de Macharius Sauerback.{/n} « Je suis le premier à condamner les libres-marchands des Étendues de Koronus pour leur mépris manifeste de la loi, mais je n'irais pas jusqu'à confondre mon opinion avec la justice. La maison Sauerback est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire narquois déforme le visage ingrat de Macharius Sauerback.{/n} « Je suis le premier à condamner les libres-marchands des Étendues de Koronus pour leur mépris manifeste de la loi, mais je n'irais pas jusqu'à confondre mon opinion avec la justice. La maison Sauerback est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克不悦的脸上露出了冷笑。{/n}“我愿意第一个谴责科罗努斯扩区的行商浪人公然无视法律的行为，不过，我可不打算将我的个人之见妄称为正义。苏尔贝克家族效忠于行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克不悦的脸上露出了冷笑。{/n}“我愿意第一个谴责科罗努斯扩区的行商浪人公然无视法律的行为，不过，我可不打算将我的个人之见妄称为正义。苏尔贝克家族效忠于行商浪人！”

languages.text: {n}El rostro desagradable de Macharius Sauerback se arruga en una sonrisa de satisfacción.{/n} «Sería el primero en condenar a los Comerciantes Independientes de la Extensión de Koronus por su flagrante desconsideración por la ley, pero jamás presentaría mi opinión como justicia. ¡La casa Sauerback es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro desagradable de Macharius Sauerback se arruga en una sonrisa de satisfacción.{/n} «Sería el primero en condenar a los Comerciantes Independientes de la Extensión de Koronus por su flagrante desconsideración por la ley, pero jamás presentaría mi opinión como justicia. ¡La casa Sauerback es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: {n}マハリウス・ザウアーバックの不快そうな顔が嘲笑に歪んだ。{/n}「私はコロヌス・エクスパンスのローグトレーダーたちが法を公然と無視していることを最も厳しく非難する者だが、私の意見を正義と偽るつもりはない。ザウアーバック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓う！」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウス・ザウアーバックの不快そうな顔が嘲笑に歪んだ。{/n}「私はコロヌス・エクスパンスのローグトレーダーたちが法を公然と無視していることを最も厳しく非難する者だが、私の意見を正義と偽るつもりはない。ザウアーバック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓う！」

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback'in sevimsiz yüzünde bir sırıtış beliriyor.{/n} "Elimde olsa kanunları alenen hiçe sayan Koronus Enginliği Hür Tacirlerini ilk ben mahkûm ederim. Ancak kendi görüşlerimi adalet diye dayatmak haddime değildir. Sauerback Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır!"
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback's unpleasant face twists into a smirk.{/n} "I would be the first to condemn the Rogue Traders of the Koronus Expanse for their flagrant disregard for the law, only I do not purport to pass off my opinion as justice. House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback'in sevimsiz yüzünde bir sırıtma beliriyor.{/n} "Elimde olsa kanunları alenen hiçe sayan Koronus Enginliği Hür Tacirlerini ilk ben mahkûm ederim. Ancak kendi görüşlerimi adalet diye dayatmak haddime değildir. Sauerback Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır!"
